game.name: Popstar Dress Up
game.description:
These boy and girls also want to look fabulous like other popular celebrities. However, they are pretty confused what they should put on to carry the celebrity look. The good news is that their wardrobe is full of trendy and fashionable outfits. Would you like to help them out to pick up the needful dresses? Join Popstar Dress Up and be prepared to mix and match as many dresses as you can to create awesome results! Use your intense fashion sense to make their first photo shoot memorable forever!

Start with the girl and then move towards the boy who also needs your fashion advice in this brand new girls game! Choose a half sleeve pink short and pair it with knee-length black pant with a black and white belt! Do not forget to complete her look with a black boot with white laces, a pair of black sunglasses and a black cape. Give her a sleeveless white short and combine it with a dark pink or blue short pant! Dress her up with the accessories you want to make her look gorgeous!

Once you are done with the girl, click the next button and get ready to dress up the boy. Select a half sleeve orange, black or light green round neck t-shirt and pair it with blue pant with a white lining or a light blue or green colour short pant! Complete his look with a pair of black shoes, a matching cap, muffler, and a tie in this HTML5 dressing game! You can also dress him up with a white shirt and match his look with a suitable tie or pant. Good luck to help both to attain the celebrity looks and have fun without download!
